title: logo feedback
content:
I need some rapid feedback for these logos. colors, type, feeling, etc.

click on the link to view

[http://www.et.byu.edu/~danielgb/typophile%20logo.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018201927/http:/www.et.byu.edu/~danielgb/typophile%20logo.pdf "http://www.et.byu.edu/~danielgb/typophile%20logo.pdf")
author: danielgb

comments.content:
First one looks like giant teeth are biting into the text, and second has a road running through it. You had a version with just typographic "bridges" in the text. That worked better than these.

Trajan is better; that lower one has some awkward glyphs, especially that e at the end.

<cite>You had a version with just typographic "bridges" in the text. That worked better than these.</cite>

I thought the same thing at first Tomi, but it looks like that was a different student in the same class — judging by the URL, at BYU.

None of these are working yet. Don't get caught up in the details of rendering bridges. Get a solid concept first. Try working with the other part of the word: 'Mind'.
